title: Riot support working hours?
body:
Hello.
I reply to some ticket i open and when riot come help me? that take so long?
Riot support working hours is 24/7 ?

replies.body: The NA office isn't working quite 24/7, but we do have other agents across the world who should be able to help at other times. We also try to individually help each player in their ticket, so sometimes the queue's can get a little backed up depending on the issues players are having.
